Articles.Content:
Sorry if this has been discussed before... and it probably has somewhere but i couldnt find it in my wading through all of the threads.

Has Squad mentioned whether or not they intend to add hinges, servos, or other robotic parts to KSP stock? I really want them but i dont want to spoil the stock game by downloading mods yet. Can anyone tell me if there has been any word on this or where i might find a thread dicussing it?

And if it hasnt been discussed CAN YOU PLEASE ADD THEM SQUAD?! pretty please with green kerbal sugar on top!

Well, it have been discussed so much in the past that it ended on the "What not to suggest" list.

This list doesn't mean that Robotic/hinge will never be integrated to the game, but that it have been asked so often that the developers definitely know about them, but did not decide whether to pursue or not the concept (as it would require a lot of coding).

If you have other ideas you want to suggest, I invite you to check said list or the Already-suggested-list before.

yeah i actually found it right after i posted... sorry about that.

So they haven't actually confirmed or denied that they will add them? on the point of how much coding... it can't be too hard since there is a mod that accomplished it.
